messages.subject: Fujita Midori....not Takagi Tokio
messages.msgSnippet: If any of you have this photo (and I know that LEGIONS RK Saitou fans have seen it at miburo.com) http://www.shinsengumihq.com/tokio-tsutomu.jpg Please make
messages.messageBody:
If any of you have this photo (and I know that LEGIONS RK Saitou
fans have seen it at miburo.com)
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/tokio-tsutomu.jpg

Please make this correction....
the photo is of Fujita Tsutomu (Goro+Tokio's 1st son)
and his wife MIDORI -not- Takagi TOKIO

*yes* I know the file name says tokio-tsutomu but that is due to an
error...

now many members of this community always wondered why Tokio looked
so young in the photo...now we know....it's not her....so basically
we don't have a photo of Tokio....but she may be in the latest photo
we have of senior citizen Fujita Goro...who knows

okay so this isn't as bad as translating fundoshi as headband....for
a while we all though Fujita Goro washed his headband everyday....oh
well

we can all thank Tama for clearing up this mess

secretarytocapt3
